name: Homemade
description:
Game initially made for AngrySmile's Beginner's Circle Jam #4

Theme: Game Show

You've seen all the game shows on TV, with their massive budgets and gaudy furniture, so you and your family thought, why not make it at home? A little bit of construction and a few hours later, you've made some Grade A enjoyment for the entire family!

Arcade Mode: The standard mode. Earn 30 points to win various challenging minigames!

Freeplay Mode: Want to practice your skills? With no restrictions, you can play any of the available minigames as much as you like!

Controls: 

Click, drag, and shoot with left mouse button

Q and E to rotate

Created by frodoTimBaku and Yammmmmy

Music and sound effects created in Beepbox and Bfxr respectively
